oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Stella Parton interview - Joe Suglia - 1977-11-06 - WBUK
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Recording of an interview with Stella Parton (performer), conducted by Joe Suglia from November 6, 1977 on radio station WBUK.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Stella Parton promotes Joe Suglia and WBUK -- Stella Parton bumper -- Joe Suglia introduces Stella Parton -- Parton talks about her latest single release -- Parton talks about traveling to England this week -- Parton talks about her songwriting -- Parton talks about the Danger Of A Stranger -- Parton talks about I Want To Hold You In My Dreams Tonight -- Parton talks about starting a label to release that song -- Parton talks about her songwriting process -- Parton talks about being distinguished from her sister, Dolly Parton -- Joe Suglia concludes the interview
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Parton, Stella;
